metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9919 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The icmp6_send function in net/ipv6/icmp.c in the Linux kernel through4.8.12 omits a certain check of the dst data structure, which allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (panic) via a fragmented IPv6packet.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
